so the base class can be used for every List-like settings activity
Merge branch 'v1.2' of github.com:azapps/mirakel-android into v1.2

Improved Semantic-Settings

It seems, that it works now :D
Added Buttons in the ActionBar of the SemanticsSettings
Set the default widget size to 4x2

Fixed Settings

* Update List onResume
* Semantic: make condition lowercase

Fix strange Bug in Sync
resetSyncState did only reset SynStat of one Task

Cleanup and improve TaskFragment
Fix strange Bug(Not loading all of TaskFragment)
Merge branch 'v1.2' of github.com:azapps/mirakel-android into v1.2

Merge branch 'v1.2' of github.com:azapps/mirakel-android into v1.2

Conflicts:
src/de/azapps/mirakel/helper/TaskDialogHelpers.java

Added possibility to select a list where a subtask should be added to

also you can use Semantic new Tasks for the subtasks

Implemented Recursive semantic

For example it is now possible to create such a task:
today important foo → could create a task 'foo' with due date=today and priority=+2
Bugfix in Task-comparement and cleanup in TW-Sync

First simple implementation of CalDavSync
Sync up to server works at least one times

Bugfixes in Task

* Fixed Task.equals
* We don't need to compare tasks in the save()-function. We check only, if the task was not edited
Bugfix: Search is now working again
Use Semantic new Tasks per default

Fixed Bug with Actionbar

When you share something with Mirakel the ActionBar and Menu is that of the TasksFragment instead of the TaskFragment

Improve CalDavSync
Two-way Sync is working(WARNING: somtimes some tasks get lost, so make a backup befor trying)
Show image in tasks-list (and widget) if there is a file or a subtask
Configure the Buttons in the TasksFragment
